column1: '''Narwain''' ([[Narvinyë]] in [[Quenya]]) was the first month of the year in the [[Kings' Reckoning
column2: Kings']] and [[Stewards' Reckoning]], and the tenth month in the [[New Reckoning]]. ''Narwain'' in the Kings' and Stewards' Reckoning corresponded to [[Afteryule]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[23 December]] through [[21 January]]).<ref>{{App
